project_abstract.cdata: The Second Karonga Rural Development Project consists of the provision of seasonal and medium term credit to farmers, extension service, market complexes, health facilities, boreholes and other infrastructural facilities, agricultural and hydrological research, preparatory investments for the National Rural Development program, and rehabilitation of berthing facilities at Chipoka Lake terminal.
